org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui
Class AeFlowLayoutManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui.AeLayoutManagerAdopter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui.AeFlowLayoutManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2
public class AeFlowLayoutManager
extends AeLayoutManagerAdopter

Implements a simple layout based on the left to right flow layout algorithm.
